hotels.title: Luxury Lakeside Tents in India with Day Spa, Restaurant & Pool
hotels.description: Overlooking the spectacular Lake Chhatra Sagar, relax with total ease in luxurious tent-style dwellings at RAAS Chhatrasagar. Perfect for a romantic retreat or small family adventure, this idyllic property boasts picturesque views of the lush rural Rajasthan surroundings ideal for exploring on foot. Enjoy a tranquil dip in the outdoor pool, indulge in an afternoon of rejuvenation at the day spa and stay nourished with delicious dishes and refreshing drinks while taking in breathtaking valley views.
